short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension requires host permissions to analyze SEO elements (meta tags, schema markup, robots.txt, etc.)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing a comprehensive on-page SEO auditing tool that empowers users to easily analyze key website elements for optimization. 

This extension helps you check Meta tags, External links, Image alt tags, Heading tags, Schema markup, and more. Whether you're optimizing your site for search engines or improving user experience, this tool provides real-time insights into your on-page SEO performance. 

Perfect for web developers, marketers, and SEO professionals, it ensures that every crucial element is aligned with best practices for better rankings and visibility.
